data.title: One Day: The full soundtrack to the Netflix series
data.meta_description: One Day just dropped on Netflix and here is the full soundtrack to the romantic comedy series.
data.text:
One Day just arrived to Netflix and the romantic comedy series needs to be on your watch list if you want something to make you laugh, cry and completely melt in your seat. But, if you're like us and have already watched the whole thing, we've got you covered on the soundtrack.

Based on the best-selling book by David Nicholls, the series stars Leo Woodall and Ambika Mod as best friends Dexter and Emma, who we first meet on their final night at university and follow through their joys, heartbreaks and relationships over the next 20 years.

Not only is the series completely binge-worthy but the soundtrack to the series is pretty great too, with tracks from the late eighties until the early noughties. So, if you like it as much as we do, then look no further because here is the full soundtrack, episode by episode, to One Day.

Temptation - New Order

These Days (1966) - Nico

Falling Colour - Vanbur

This is the Day (1983) - The The

We're adding these songs to our playlists as we speak.

One Day is on Netflix now.

Furvah Shah

Junior Entertainment and Lifestyle Writer

Furvah Shah is Cosmopolitan UK’s junior entertainment and lifestyle writer. She covers everything from TV and films to music and books, plus lots of celebrity news. Furvah has previously written for The Independent, BBC, gal-dem and Amaliah and she is super passionate about highlighting diverse talent and projects, having interviewed the likes of Halle Bailey, India Amarteifio, Iman Vellani and more. She's been interviewed for Times Radio and BBC Asian Network, graduated with a First in BA Media and Communications from Goldsmiths University and is an NCTJ-qualified journalist. In her free time, you can find her at an arts or culture event, eating Middle Eastern or Asian food, searching for modest fashion inspiration on Pinterest, binge-watching a Netflix series or cuddling with her cat. You can follow Furvah on Twitter, Instagram, TikTok and LinkedIn.
